title: Keyword Research - SEO Blog by Ahrefs
description: Keyword research is the foundation of SEO. You can't get search traffic unless people are searching for your topic. Check out the resources below to build a solid SEO foundation.

You can't get search traffic unless people are searching for your topic. Check out the resources below to build a solid SEO foundation.Our Best Articles on Keyword Research We handpicked these from the 250+ posts on the blog. How to Do Keyword Research for SEO Learn how to find, analyze, target, and prioritize the best keywords for SEO. What Are Keywords? How to Use Them for SEO Learn what keywords are and how you should and shouldn't use them. Long-tail Keywords: What They Are and How to Get Search Traffic From Them Drive more search traffic to your website with long-tail keywords. How to Use Google Trends for Keyword Research: 7 Effective Ways Find winning keywords with this underutilized free tool. The 10 Best Free Keyword Research Tools in 2024 Here are the best keyword tools for every task. How to Use Google Keyword Planner in 2024 Learn how to master Google Keyword Planner with this complete, newbie-friendly guide.
